description: Pensive is a full MERN stack application. For its development MongoDB was used for the Database. ExpressJs was used for routing user traffice and communication between the front end client and server software. ReactJs was used to build the user interface, and Node was used for developing the web apps backend functions.
A basic CRUD application built using a MySQL database, ExpressJs routing, HandlebarsJs for the front end, and a NodeJs server.
A simplified version of the clasic Pokemon RPG, built in jQuery.
A game of hangman based on Pokemon, each round is powered by an API call to the PokeAPI.
View the source code for this portfolio!
LIRI is a command-line node app that takes in parameters and gives you back data by making API calls to various web services.
